@mjackson I'm also not a huge fan of being placed into some sort of blinkered tribe, which I feel your tweet does. I (and many folks with similar enthusiasms) understand nuance would prefer to avoid presenting web dev as a zero sum, holy war. You and I agree far more than we disagree
